content: Below you can find a breakdown of each Gourd in the game, where they are located, and the buffs they offer. Over time each link will take you to a dedicated page on where to find the Gourds. You can also use our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gourds.md', within the main section titled 'Gourds', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gourd Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Best Black Myth Wukong Gourds'.
The content is as follows:
Below you can find a breakdown of each Gourd in the game, where they are located, and the buffs they offer. Over time each link will take you to a dedicated page on where to find the Gourds. You can also use our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them.
